headline: Steel Dynamics (STLD) Declines More Than Market: Some Information for Investors
summary: Steel Dynamics (STLD) reached $130.11 at the closing of the latest trading day, reflecting a -2.29% change compared to its last close.

headline: Steel Dynamics' Outlook Comes Up Short, But Some Positives Mute Stock Losses
summary: Steel Dynamics shares fell Wednesday on the steelmaker's weaker-than-expected outlook, although the loss was offset by a positive projection for its steel and aluminum operations.

headline: Nucor Stock Rises on Strong Forecast. Steel Dynamics Heads the Opposite Direction.
summary: Nucor expects earnings of $2.55 to $2.65 a share., while the consensus call on Wall Street is that the result will be $2.36 a share.

headline: Steel Dynamics Provides Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Guidance
summary: Steel Dynamics, Inc. (NASDAQ/GS: STLD) today provided second quarter 2025 earnings guidance in the range of $2.00 to $2.04 per diluted share. Comparatively, the company's sequential first quarter 2025 earnings were $1.44 per diluted share and prior year second quarter earnings were $2.72 per diluted share.

headline: Is Steel Dynamics Stock Underperforming the S&P 500?
summary: Steel Dynamics has underperformed the broader S&P 500 Index over the past year, yet analysts remain highly bullish on the stock’s prospects.
